trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of all [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) elements in a project.
trans-unit.target: Az összes számoknak [cél](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) elemek projektben.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element to the end of the project.
trans-unit.target: Hozzáad egy új [cél](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) elem a projekt végére.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attribute of the new <xref uid="langword_csharp_Target" name="Target" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""> </xref> az új attribútum <xref uid="langword_csharp_Target" name="Target" href=""> </xref> elemet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"></xref> object representing the created `Target` element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"> </xref> jelképező a létrehozott `Target` elemet.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref> to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Másolja át a teljes <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> </xref> egy kompatibilis egydimenziós <xref:System.Array>, a megadott index a céltömb induló.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az egydimenziós <xref:System.Array>vagyis átmásolva elem cél <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Array>kell rendelkeznie a nulla alapú indexelést.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: A nulla alapú indexét `array` mely másolása megkezdődik.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték szám, amely lekérdezi <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"> </xref> objektumokat a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target> object in the collection represents a element in the project.
trans-unit.target: Minden egyes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target>a gyűjteményben lévő objektum által jelképezett egy elem ebben a projektben.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target>

trans-unit.source: An integer value representing the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Számát jelző egész értéket <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"> </xref> objektumok a gyűjteményben.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"></xref> exists in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Meghatározza, hogy a megadott <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"> </xref> szerepel a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attribute of the Target element to search for.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""> </xref> attribútuma a célelem kereséséhez.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the `Target` element exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a `Target` elem létezik; egyéb esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi számbavevő telepítéseket a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer lehetővé teszi, hogy a hívó használatára a `foreach` utasítás a C# nyelv (`for each` a [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) az iterációt az egyes <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target>objektumok az <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection> </xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>a teljes <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely jelzi, hogy hozzáférést lekérdezi a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> </xref> van (a többszálú futtatásra) szinkronizálva.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a hozzáférést a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> </xref> van (a többszálú futtatásra) szinkronizált; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"></xref> object in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a megadott <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"> </xref> objektum a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target> object represents a `Target` element in the project.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target>objektum jelöli egy `Target` elem ebben a projektben.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attribute of the Target element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""> </xref> attribútum a cél elem a gyűjteményben.

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the property value specified by index.
trans-unit.target: A objektum, amely tartalmazza a tulajdonság értéke által meghatározott index .

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element from the project.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja a megadott [cél](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) elem a projektből.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Target" name="Target" href=""></xref> element to remove.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""> </xref> attribútuma a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Target" name="Target" href=""> </xref> elem eltávolításához.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Olyan objektum, amely segítségével való hozzáférés szinkronizálása lekérdezi a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Olyan objektum, amely segítségével való hozzáférés szinkronizálása a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> </xref>.
